post.body: Shouldn't that film have starred (wait for it) ... Val Kilmer?!

you can be assured there are sorts of cheeseniks. Check out Murray's Cheese in Greenwich Village. Good site, *great* store.
To those of us who love words, word play, etymology it is a source of amusement. To some, though, it might as well be Soduko.
Off to VA for New Year's party. Still recovering from minor surgery last wk. Vote for me (Shorty Award) http://tinyurl.com/9my2dh
Very sad to learn that Jazz trumpeter Freddie Hubbard passed away. Among the best to graduate Butler's Jordan Conservatory (my alma mater)

Not only is it Marsalis/Lincoln Ctr Jazz Orchestra & Alvin Ailey troupe. Its an all Ellington program. Wow!
Had dinner @ Carnegie Deli between Ailey/Marsalis shows. Music & Dance par excellence. Carnegie:way too much food=doggie bag.
Going to see 2 Alvin Ailey Dance Co.performances today, 1 w/ Wynton Marsalis & Jazz @ Lincoln Center Orch. Its Ailey Co's 50th anniversary
